snippet: Urging alternatives for economic growth, tens of thousands of demonstrators rallied in Spain, Britain, France, Greece, Germany and beyond.
abstract: European May Day celebrations take on a special resonance as thousands of demonstrators gather across the continent to protest enforced austerity measures and the growing gap between rich and poor.

byline.contributor: Raphael Minder contributed reporting from Madrid, Melissa Eddy from Berlin, and Niki Kitsantonis from Athens.

lead_paragraph: Urging alternatives for economic growth, tens of thousands of demonstrators rallied in Spain, Britain, France, Greece, Germany and beyond.

headline.seo: Austerity Intensifies May Day Protests in Europe
headline.main: Austerity Pain Fills Europe With Protests on May Day
headline.print_headline: Austerity Pain Fills Europe With Protests On May Day
